textBox.richText: We just can’t seem to get enough of this frozen water stuff. Yesterday we were walking on a glacier, today we’re swimming in a lake filled with ice bergs. Ok so we didn’t quite go swimming but we did stick our arms in! Trust us it was pretty cold. Mt Edith Cavell is about an hours drive from Jasper and has an amazing asset. At the foot of the glacier pinned to its cliffs is a pool of icy water complimented with hundreds of miniature ice bergs. Throw in a few penguins and we could have mistaken it for Antarctica, throw in a massive chunk of lemon and I’d mistake it for a gin and tonic!
